copilot.instructions: When the user needs to test changes in the Blazor application, always ask them to run 'dotnet watch' manually instead of trying to start/stop services programmatically. This avoids port conflicts and service management issues.
Never use taskkill or process termination commands - let the user manage the dotnet watch process manually.
When debugging is needed, add console logging and ask the user to check the browser console or terminal output while the app is running.
